name: BeatShips
description: Flow with the music while defeating enemies. You can use your favourite music to create and share levels with the community and also download new ones to extend your gameplay. Complete levels and unlock new ships and skins to get new game styles and cool looks.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: i3-7100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 560 GTX DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: i5-8600 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: nVidia 960 GTX DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: Integrated
